Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Take advantage of your deviceÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s camera to fill an area on a layer with the unique Camera Fill feature.

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Start a project on your iPhone or iPod Touch and finish it on your iPad* or back in Photoshop** at your desk using a free membership to Adobe Creative CloudÃ¢â€žÂ¢.*** Your projects are automatically synced between your devices.
